item.title: A Timestamp Plugin for Sublime Text 3
item.description: Since switching from Windows to a Mac in the middle of developing a new wiki, I lost access to the MarkdownPad Markdown editor – it’s Windows only. One of the nice features of MarkdownPad was the ability to insert a timestamp easily. It’s what I used to insert the creation date and the time of the last modification. Since the switch, I’ve been using Sublime Text 3 as my editor for Markdown files.
